message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the potential it holds for you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $1500000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.

I'm very interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. This is the highest I can go, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
